about.title: About
about.description: I'm a full-stack developer passionate about creating innovative digital solutions and exceptional user experiences. With experience in modern technologies, I always seek to learn and evolve.
about.paragraph1: I work with React, Node.js, TypeScript and other technologies to build scalable and performant web applications. I believe that clean and well-structured code is fundamental to the success of any project.
about.paragraph2: When I'm not coding, I like to contribute to the open-source community, participate in hackathons and share knowledge through articles and talks.
